definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Lee Chang-ho (1975-), South Korean Go player
Haojing (in modern Shaanxi, northwest of Chang'an county), capital of Western Zhou from c. 1050 BC

sentences.english: This was done by a number of means , including chipping at the buildings with pickaxes .
sentences.chinese: 這是做了一些手段，包括插話在建築物與鎬。

sentences.english: Prof Wang Zihao, the president of BUCT hosted the welcome reception.
sentences.chinese: 王子鎬校長出席了歡迎晚宴並祝酒。

sentences.english: They broke the hard frozen earth with picks.
sentences.chinese: 他們用鎬把堅硬的凍土鑿開。

sentences.english: Other-worldly chanting, to the rhythm of the rising and falling picks resonated through the hot, still air.
sentences.chinese: 悶熱的空氣裏迴盪着聖歌的旋律和鎬斧起落的聲音。

sentences.english: Ice Climbers use ice axes to move up frozen waterfalls.
sentences.chinese: 攀冰是用冰鎬在冰瀑上攀爬的運動。

sentences.english: They used picks and sledges to break the rocks.
sentences.chinese: 他們用鎬和撬來打碎這些岩石。

sentences.english: The Greeks used onyx, agate, and quartz in making their scarabs.
sentences.chinese: 鎬瑪腦，瑪瑙石英制造聖甲蟲。

sentences.english: I run onto the summit and I shake my ice axes at the sun.
sentences.chinese: 我在峯頂之上狂奔，對着太陽炫耀我的冰鎬。

sentences.english: Yingxiu and Yinghao were born in the same year.
Hellstone and Obsidian now require at least a Demonite pick to gather.
sentences.chinese: 這下惡魔石級的鎬成採黑曜石和地獄石必須品了。

sentences.english: P175 You don't let go of your ax, no matter what.
sentences.chinese: 無論怎樣都不要弄丟了你的冰鎬。

sentences.english: He stole the pickaxe from the production team and was therefore criticized by the team leader.
sentences.chinese: 他偷了生產隊的鐵鎬，遭到了隊長的批評。

sentences.english: And he laid the shovel and mattock on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 同時他把鍬和鎬放在方磚地上。
